```{r libraries, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(RColorBrewer) 
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
brewer.pal(n=8, name = "Dark2"); #display.brewer.pal(n = 8, name = "Dark2")
theme_set(theme_classic())
```

## full dataset (df)

```{r df}
df=tibble(read.csv("CB-mouthColor.csv", h=T))

colorTemp.df = df %>% 
  select(date, nestlingDataID, nestlingDataSexSum, nestlingDataAge, nestlingDataWeight, 
                            tongueY1, tongueY2, tongueM1, tongueM2, tongueSat1, tongueSat2,
                            ambTemp1, ambTemp2, bodyTemp1, bodyTemp2)
```


```{r}
colorTemp.df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=tongueY1, y=bodyTemp1))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```
